entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
